00020 // Copyright Author Dany De Bontridder ddebontridder@yahoo.fr
00021 header('Content-type: application/csv');
00022 header('Content-Disposition: attachment;filename="jrn.csv"',FALSE);
00023 include_once ("ac_common.php");
00024 
00025 include_once ("postgres.php");
00026 include_once("check_priv.php");
00027 include("class_jrn.php");
00028 $cn=DbConnect($_SESSION['g_dossier']);
00029 $rep=DbConnect();
00030 
00031 include ('class_user.php');
00032 $User=new cl_user($rep);
00033 $User->Check();
00034 if ( $User->CheckAction($cn,IMP) == 0 ||
00035      $User->AccessJrn($cn,$_GET['jrn_id']) == false){
00036     /* Cannot Access */
00037     NoAccess();
00038   }
00039 
00040 
00041  $p_cent=( isset ( $_GET['central']) )?$_GET['central']:'off';
00042 
00043 $Jrn=new jrn($cn,$_GET['jrn_id']);
00044 
00045 $Jrn->GetName();
00046 // Detailled printing
00047 //---
00048 if  ( $_GET['p_simple'] == 0 ) 
00049   {
00050     $Jrn->GetRow( $_GET['from_periode'],
00051                   $_GET['to_periode'],
00052                   $p_cent);
00053 
00054     if ( count($Jrn->row) == 0) 
00055       exit;
00056     foreach ( $Jrn->row as $op ) { 
00057       // should clean description : remove <b><i> tag and '; char
00058       $desc=$op['description'];
00059       $desc=str_replace("<b>","",$desc);
00060       $desc=str_replace("</b>","",$desc);
00061       $desc=str_replace("<i>","",$desc);
00062       $desc=str_replace("</i>","",$desc);
00063       $desc=str_replace('"',"'",$desc);
00064 
00065       printf("\"%s\"\t\"%s\"\t\"%s\"\t\"%s\"\t\"%s\"\t%8.4f\t%8.4f\n",
00066              $op['j_id'],
00067              $op['internal'],
00068              $op['j_date'],
00069              $op['poste'],
00070              $desc,
00071              $op['cred_montant'],
00072              $op['deb_montant']
00073              );
00074         
00075     }
00076     exit;
00077   }
00078  else 
00079    {
00080      $Row=$Jrn->GetRowSimple($_GET['from_periode'],
00081                              $_GET['to_periode'],
00082                              $p_cent);
00084      printf ('" operation "'.
00085              '"Date"'.
00086              '"commentaire"'.
00087              '"internal"'.
00088              '"montant"');
00089 
00090       foreach ($Row as $line)
00091         {
00092           echo $line['num'].";";
00093           echo $line['date'].";";
00094           echo $line['comment'].";";
00095           echo $line['jr_internal'].";";
00096           //      echo "<TD>".$line['pj'].";";
00097         // If the ledger is financial :
00098         // the credit must be negative and written in red
00099         // Get the jrn type
00100         if ( $line['jrn_def_type'] == 'FIN' ) {
00101           $positive = CountSql($cn,"select * from jrn inner join jrnx on jr_grpt_id=j_grpt ".
00102                    " where jr_id=".$line['jr_id']." and (j_poste like '55%' or j_poste like '57%' )".
00103                                " and j_debit='f'");
00104         
00105 
00106         echo ( $positive != 0 )?sprintf("-%8.2f",$line['montant']):sprintf("%8.2f",$line['montant']);
00107         echo ";";
00108         }
00109         else 
00110           {
00111             printf("% 8.2f",$line['montant']).";";
00112           }
00113 
00114         printf("\r\n");
00115         }
00116       
00118    }
00119 ?>
